function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Emerging technology built by the transition of functions from biological systems","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the development systems","Mitigation":"Strict biosecurity measures and regular monitoring of bio-mimicked processes","Technologies":"Biosecurity systems, monitoring technology","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers, and workers in bio-mimicked development systems","Owner":"Laboratories, research institutions, and bio-mimicked development facilities"},{"Description":"Biomimetic transformation into a technical circumstance of the natural life cycle","Impact":"Risk of unintended replication of biological systems that may harbor contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Stringent testing and verification of biomimetic processes for potential disease carriers","Technologies":"Diagnostic technology, genetic sequencing, and bioinformatics","People":"Biologists, engineers, and technicians involved in biomimetic transformations","Owner":"Biotechnology companies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Bio-mimicked products and methods need analysis","Impact":"Undetected presence of contagious pathogens in bio-mimicked products and processes","Mitigation":"Comprehensive pathogen screening and quality control of bio-mimicked products and methods","Technologies":"Pathogen detection systems, quality control technology","People":"Quality control inspectors, researchers, and consumers of bio-mimicked products","Owner":"Manufacturers of bio-mimicked products and regulatory bodies"}]}
